text: Select the model you want to use.
Specify the POPULATION. You can choose the affected population size and the initial number of cases.
Specify the VACCINE characteristics, including the vaccine efficacy and offset of immunity.
In TRIAL you can select the starting day of trial, the number of vaccine doses and the number of days the trial will run for.
EPIDEMICS allows you to choose number of days the virus is latent after infection and the duration of infection (in days).
You can play around with the INTERVENTION parameters to change the spread of the epidemic.
That's it. Enjoy useing EBOVAC and don't hesitate if you have suggestions or comments. You're feedback is very much appreciated!
